mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee(emp_name, emp_nationality, emp_phone, emp_number, emp_visa, emp_date, emp_memo, company_id) VALUES (#{empName}, #{empNation}, #{empPhone}, #{empNumber}, #{empVisa}, #{empDate}, #{empMemo}, #{companyId});
mapper.select: SELECT employee_id as empId, emp_name as empName, emp_nationality as empNation, emp_phone as empPhone, emp_number as empNumber, emp_visa as empVisa, emp_date as empDate, emp_memo as empMemo, company_id as companyId FROM employee WHERE emp_name = #{empName} AND emp_number = #{empNumber};
